answer: To book an appointment, go to Dashboard → Book Service and follow the steps.
Manage vehicles in Profile → Vehicles. You can add, edit or remove vehicles there.
Invoices are available in History → Invoices; you can download or pay online.
To sign in to the Enterprise Application, go to the Login page and enter your company credentials. If you forgot your password, use the 'Forgot password' flow to reset it.
To register, open the Register page and fill in the required fields. Contact your administrator if registration requires approval.
The backend exposes REST APIs under /api/. Consult the API documentation for available endpoints and required authentication headers.
Notifications are sent via the Notification System. Check your profile notification settings to enable or disable email/SMS notifications.
Vehicle-related operations are available in the Vehicles section of the Dashboard. You can add, edit, and track vehicles there.
There are three packages available: Basic, Pro, and Enterprise. Each package offers different features and support levels. Please refer to the pricing page for more details.
